title: [Ta'Illistim, BriarStone Court]
description: Set well back from the court stands a small stonework building, its marble doorpost and window embrasures heavily carved with fan-tailed peacocks.  A tarnished mithglin plaque swings from a rod mounted beside the building's thick door.  A single lantern mounted on a nearby post casts a diffuse blue glow across the area.

Set well back from the court stands a small stonework building, its grey granite doorpost and window embrasures heavily carved with grinning gargoyles.  A dark mithglin plaque swings from a rod mounted beside the building's thick ironwood door.

Set well back from the court stands a small stonework building, its grey granite doorpost and window embrasures heavily carved with grinning gargoyles.  A dark mithglin plaque swings from a rod mounted beside the building's thick ironwood door.  A single lantern mounted on a nearby post casts a dull yellow glow across the area.

Set well back from the court stands a small stonework building, its marble doorpost and window embrasures heavily carved with fan-tailed peacocks.  A tarnished mithglin plaque swings from a rod mounted beside the building's thick door.
